thread.section_title: Hotel Montalembert - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful place
thread.title_full: Wonderful place - Review of Hotel Montalembert, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: T C
title: Wonderful place
text:
We spent 5 nights in this newly renovated hotel. It's tucked slightly away from the bustle of Boulevard Saint Germain so that you are close to so many places while still maintaining the private luxury of a boutique hotel. A short walk to numerous museums, shops and restaurants. We had a junior sweet which offered plenty of space-especially the dressing area. Our large windows opened to a view of the Eiffel Tower and Grand Palais. Breakfast was delivered each morning at the exact time we requested. I can't say enough about the attentive staff that was always willing to help us with any request.
We look forward to our next trip to Paris and Hotel Montalembert.
Room Tip: room 71 had beautiful views See more room tips
